name: screenbeard
message: These posts go to Buzz where other people can comment on them. I'm not sure that they get picked up by Disqus though, so here's a link to it, because Larry Anderson left an excellent comment for anyone who wants a bit more information to make a decision: http://www.google.com/buzz/nunn.joshua/fSBXVk2zkwH/Should-I-Buy-a-Mac
